Are cysts normally pain free?  On a different note even thoe this lump is pain free I have been having TERRIBLE neck pain and headaches. Ahhhhhhhhhhhhh. I am hoping it's just from stress and tension and nothing to do with this other issue. Prayers are welcome and THANK YOU VERY MUCH in advance!!! Big hugs!

Posts.Content: Oct 27, 2011 01:47PM SmileItsP wrote: I really want to say THANK YOU to each and every one of you that have replied to this topic! You ladies have REALLY helped me out. Even the posts that were not so tender, LOL. I needed to hear them. @Kimmer.. WOW! We have the same sort of thing going on. Thanks so much for sharing. I will keep you in my prayers! I did call the place where I am going to get the CT scan done at and asked if I would be finding the results that day. She basically said more than likely not because either way it would need to be reviewed by a radiologist... Then they would get the results to my Dr, and then they would tell me at a follow up visit I assume. :) I hope the technician can give me a little clue like yours did you. :) It will def make my mind more easy. This lump in my armpit is about 1-2cm as well. It is def not shrinking or going anywhere, but I know that doesnt nessesarly mean anything. Thank you again ladies! I will find out more (hopefully) on Nov 9th!! :) ((( BIG HUGS!!))) p.s. can someone please send me a inbox message? for some reason I dont think my inbox messages or working. lol Just want to test it. TY in advance!

It was about the sized of a pencil head. Now it is the size of a pea, and it has grown that much in a month. I haven't told one single person because I just don't want to hear everyone ask me over and over again, " Did you go to the dr, What did they say?", etc.  My question is, what could it be besides a cancer? Posts.Content: Nov 10, 2011 01:13AM SmileItsP wrote: After I asked how do I know FOR SURE what it is, she said I would need to go to a dermatologist and have a biopsy done. She didn't act the least bit concerned that I do this. She only mentioned it after I asked, because her comment " I think its a blocked sweat gland" made me nervous because " I THINK" just isn't too sure to me... Hum.. I have a few close friends that think I need to get the biopsy done. What do you all think? If the doctor "THINKS" its a blocked sweat gland, should I just go with it, and leave it alone? Or talk to my doctor about getting a biopsy. I was thinking if it grew anymore, I would def try to set up a biopsy. Let me know your thoughts. xo!
Posts.Title: Lump in left armpit pea sized, Scared to DEATH to go to dr. O_O SmileItsP Kimmer1975

Posts.Content: Nov 10, 2011 03:48PM SmileItsP wrote: Thanks ladies.  After speaking to a few close friends, and reading these replies I think I am going to push for a biopsy. The CT tech, and Radiologist were not breast specialists, and I think I would feel more comfortable KNOWING for sure that this isn't something serious. I really have a hard time believing its a blocked sweat gland, when reading up on a blocked sweat gland this is not it by the symptoms people describe. Do people typically get a response from a CT " I think this is what it is"? I don't think that will settle well with anyone considering all the harping one recieves on "Get it checked, get it checked".. and we all hear it everywhere. The sooner the better, Do it now.. Etc.  I want to know FOR SURE that it's nothing... I am waiting on a call back from my primary care doctor, to talk to her or her nurse about this. Bottom line, I don't feel comfortable with " I think" being the diagnosis here. I know everyones circumstances are different. I had a friend years back that went to her Dr. for the same type of thing, they told her the small lump was from her drinking too much caffeine. She went home, 3 years later cancer had spread all over her body, and she passed away a few years back.  My point being, I don't think " I think" should be acceptable. Or I would like a 2nd opinion from a breast specialist, and a new CT scan from a breast specialist. Then maybe the biopsy. We shall see. I do appreciate everyones opinion, support, Etc.. Xo!

Posts.Content: Nov 18, 2011 10:18PM SmileItsP wrote: Went for a follow up today with my regular doctor and the radiologist put her findings to be a cyst! She never said one word to me about a cyst! She said she "Thinks" it's a clogged sweat gland. AMAZING! I have a great doctor. She has ordered for it to be removed and a biopsy done. I will feel so much better that way than "THINKING" its something. I would rather KNOW it's nothing. Looking fwd to getting it over with. Ain't nuttin to it but to DO IT!!!!!!!!!! :) Thanks again everyone! xo!
